title: (sem4) Rate these professors
content:
|CHARU KATHURIA|MPCA|
|:-|:-|
|VINODHA K |MATH|
|VANDANA M LADWANI|DAA|
|KESAVAN|Operating system|
|MONIKA GOYAL|Computer Networks|

comments.body:
Charu ma’am- amazing teacher, can approach her for any doubts she’ll gladly help


Vinodha ma’am- good teacher if you can pay attention to her, really sweet


Vandana ma’am - have never had her but heard she’s knowledgeable


Last two are probably new

Vandana ma'am was REALLY GOOD. She is softspoken, but is competent af.

Vinodha maam is sweet af. Just sit off in frontbench, and you can get away with anything
